author: Mike Robinson
method: Combine the dressing ingredients to make the caesar sauce. Shred the lettuce. Toss in the dressing. Add the anchovies and crispy lardons. Griddle the prawns and add the lime juice. Make the croutons by cutting up and  frying the bread with the thyme and garlic. Serve the dressed salad with the croutons and prawns, garnish with two rashers of bacon on top.
ingredients: olive oil,  small jar of mayonnaise,  1 lemon, juice only,  2 garlic cloves,  2-3 anchovies,  capers,  deep-fried as a garnish,  bread, for croutons, 1 slice per person,  1 sprig of thyme ,  1 garlic clove,  110g/4oz lardons, fried until crispy,  young cos or romaine, 1 small lettuce per person,  king prawns, 3 per person,  1 lime, juice only,  2 rashers fried bacon, for garnish
